name: Barrage Breaker
description:
Survive all the loops!

     
This is just a pure gameplay demonstration.
During the Jam, I tried to make it as juicy as possible.
I'd love to hear your opinion :)

Controls:
  • Preferable played with gamepad!
  • Shot Stuff  Left Click / Right Stick
  • Switch Weapon Mouse Wheel / R2 and L2
  • Dash  Shift / X Button
  • Use Potions  R Key / R1
  • Ultimate E Key / L1 (When flame bar is charged)
Music by:
  • RichaadEB - F-Zero- Big Blue Cover
  • RichaadEB - Pokémon Sword & Shield - Battle Tower
